title: Fill Me
description: 3 friends. 1 band. Fate starts here.A garage band drummer who can’t keep her boyfriend satisfied. A bassist who’s performing on darker stages than the musical kind, and can’t tell his BFF. A lead singer who can’t seem to hold the headliner spot in his own friendships.It’s just one more dive bar gig, but tonight, all the band’s secrets are coming out.This prequel is a short-story-length introduction to the band The Red Letters. It takes place before the books about each of the band members. Click now to join them backstage!
author: Michelle Hazen
